Reviews.Title: “Excellent value/location choice”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights happy motel reasonable price walk park zoo village harbour quickly gaslamp quarter clean totally bed bug free comfortable beds pillows maid service motel provides mini toiletries shampoo soap lotion ironing facilities ice machine hall peep neighbouring fair amount traffic noise 1am voices street 1st floor overlooking road balcony breakfast included ran selection packaged muffins packaged danish pastries cereal toast juice cartons teacoffee bagels toast childrens yogurt

Reviews.Title: “A great stay!”
Reviews.Author: Rich8506
Reviews.Content: motel downtown san diego balcony nice view quiet safe extremely clean staff pleasant couldnt id definitely recommend leave constructive criticism breakfast slightly frozen left thaw served toast slightly cold middle maybe splash normal temperature bread bought days thats criticism thanks days inn san diego nice trip

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice for Downtown San Diego”
Reviews.Author: artathomesd
Reviews.Content: stayed days inn times 4 enjoy clean comfortable balcony view fora reasonable price days inn convenient gaslamp symphony hall numerous restaurnats walking distance reason stay wonderful sevice ramiro front desk efficient helpful whatever guest wait checking people ahead friendly makes effort guests feel welcomed makes guests feel home home real asset days inn property

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Motel”
Reviews.Author: Clembo1957
Reviews.Content: value motel downtown san diego clean looked seen days modern tv double beds reasonable bathroom cost expect days inn wasnt bad evidence bedbugs stay reception staff friendly helpful receptionist book taxi morning didnt hotel fairly quiet stay walking distance gaslamp quarter downtown free continental breakfast served didnt check cheap stay nights days inn worth shot dont expect 4 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice touches in room”
Reviews.Author: Mary W
Reviews.Content: husband stayed night hotel excepting amazed personal free bottles water refrigerator bag microwavable popcorn health bars snack meant lot bed comfortable view surprisingly beautiful looking downtown

Reviews.Title: “Real Value for Money!”
Reviews.Author: Bharathy
Reviews.Content: booking hotel mixed feelings proceed reading reviews property breakfast etc continued booked regretted experience staying real value money double booked children spacious bed comfortable lovely set pillows cleaned prompt breakfast filling 3 kinds donuts chocolate chip muffins 2 kinds sticky buns fruits cereals milk coffee tea juices conveniently located access buses trolleys airport appreciated immensely service rendered jeff taking care reception helpful

Reviews.Title: “I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Days Inn. I'll definitely stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: carr403
Reviews.Content: thoroughly enjoyed stay days inn san diego convention returned times stay days inn surprised offer free internet breakfast etc typically pay extra hotels day arrived moving mattresses lucky brand mattress stay mattress home comfortable front desk staff helpful friendly housekeeping department job cleaning day spent time day balboa park couple wonderful evenings gaslamp quarter close wish stayed time town cruise close cruise terminal ill returning convention convention center soon ill definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel in a good location for a very good value including free breakfast”
Reviews.Author: cchagas
Reviews.Content: stayed family location close downtown harbor gas lamp district ok standard free breakfast ok represent travelling family 4 tight lobby hotel extremelly uncomfortable seat families impossible accomodate staff friendly service 24h extra towel 0700 am wasn´t sufficient towes phoned reception informed cleaning staff 0800 hs reception deal anyway sum value combining location accomodations price

Reviews.Title: “A truly amazing deal”
Reviews.Author: USALove2Travel
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights january downtown san hotels expensive amazing rate directly days inns website relaxed cancellation policy expedia hotel 10 min drive airport blocks i5 20min walk gas lamp district safe walk exercise saves parking fees night checkin smooth friendly courteous front desk staff king spacious clean nice view downtown balcony complimentary inroom safe pleasant suprise didnt minifridge microwave handy guests breakfast served lobby variety items pastries oatmeal juices coffeetea fruit isnt sit guests breakfast free parking midsize rental challenge parking rear parking lot issue front parking lot street parking hotel free night metered day overall amazing deal top wonderful trip sd hope stayer future

Reviews.Title: “No frills hotel, but nice and clean.”
Reviews.Author: sweet_sac
Reviews.Content: recommend days inn travelling san diego bit budget wishing stay grubby downtown hostel arrival car park little cramped wasnt squeeze car checkin easy staying days offered top floor view downtown towards petco park easy walking distance gaslamp ballpark cleaned day fresh towels etc downside check 530am desk slide note door post keys
